air-fryer-churro-bites-vr20.name: Air Fryer Churro Bites
air-fryer-churro-bites-vr20.notes: Work in batches so the pastry has space to puff properly.
steps: Preheat the air fryer to 190°C.
Unroll the puff pastry sheet and cut into small bite-sized rectangles.
Brush the pastry pieces lightly with melted butter.
Air fry in batches for 6 to 8 minutes until puffed and golden.
In a bowl, mix caster sugar and ground cinnamon.
Brush the hot pastry bites with any remaining butter, then toss in the cinnamon sugar until well coated.
Serve warm with chocolate sauce for dipping.

air-fryer-pizza-bagels-vr42.name: Air Fryer Pizza Bagels
air-fryer-pizza-bagels-vr42.notes: Use mini bagels for bite-sized party snacks.
steps: Preheat the air fryer to 190°C.
Spread pizza sauce over the cut side of each bagel half.
Top with grated mozzarella and pepperoni slices.
Air fry for 5 to 7 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Sprinkle with dried oregano and serve hot.

baked-feta-Eggs-vr37.name: Baked Feta Eggs
baked-feta-Eggs-vr37.notes: Great with a pinch of chilli flakes on top.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Add cherry tomatoes to a small baking dish and drizzle with olive oil.
Stir in the minced garlic and season with salt and black pepper.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until the tomatoes start to burst.
Remove from the oven, sprinkle over the crumbled feta and make four small wells.
Crack an egg into each well and sprinkle with dried oregano.
Return to the oven for 8 to 10 minutes until the egg whites are set but yolks are still runny.
Serve straight from the dish with crusty bread for dipping.

baked-feta-Eggs-wrap-vr44.name: Baked Feta Eggs Breakfast Wrap
baked-feta-Eggs-wrap-vr44.notes: Great with a drizzle of hot sauce inside the wrap.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Add cherry tomatoes and crumbled feta to a small baking dish, drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with dried oregano.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until the tomatoes soften and the feta is warmed.
Crack the eggs into the dish and season with salt and black pepper.
Return to the oven for 6 to 8 minutes until the eggs are just set.
Warm the tortilla wraps and layer with spinach leaves.
Spoon the baked feta and eggs into each wrap, then roll up and serve.

ingredients: Pasta, Short Shape Like Fusilli Or Penne (350 g)
baked-feta-pasta-vr11.name: Baked Feta Cherry Tomato Pasta
baked-feta-pasta-vr11.notes: Use wholewheat pasta to make it a bit lighter but still comforting.
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C.
Add cherry tomatoes to a baking dish and drizzle with olive oil.
Place the block of feta in the centre of the dish.
Scatter sliced garlic, dried oregano and chilli flakes over the top.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until the tomatoes are blistered and the feta is soft.
Cook the pasta according to the packet instructions until al dente, then reserve a cup of pasta water and drain.
Use a fork to mash the feta and tomatoes together into a creamy sauce.
Stir in the cooked pasta, adding a splash of pasta water if needed to loosen the sauce.
Finish with fresh basil leaves and serve hot.

baked-oat-bars-vr47.name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Oat Bars
baked-oat-bars-vr47.notes: Store in an airtight container for up to 3 days.
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C and line a small baking tin with baking paper.
In a bowl mix mashed banana, peanut butter, honey and egg until smooth.
Stir in oats, baking powder, salt and chocolate chips.
Spread the mixture evenly into the tin.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes until golden and set.
Allow to cool completely before cutting into bars.

baked-oats-vr32.name: Chocolate Chip Baked Oats
baked-oats-vr32.notes: Blend in half a banana for extra sweetness and moisture.
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C.
Add oats, milk, egg, maple syrup, vanilla, baking powder and salt to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the mixture into a small greased ovenproof dish or ramekin.
Sprinkle chocolate chips over the top.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes until risen and just set in the middle.
Serve warm straight from the dish.

ingredients: Lighter Than Light Mayo, Hellmann’s (200 g)
bang-bang-chicken.name: Bang Bang Chicken
steps: Add the peppers and chicken to an oven-proof dish.
Season with soy sauce, smoked paprika and onion granules.
Mix well.
In a separate bowl, make the bang bang sauce by mixing mayo, sweet chilli and sriracha.
Brush half of the bang bang sauce over the chicken mixture, then cook in the oven at 180°C for 30 minutes.
Whilst the chicken is cooking, cook the rice.
Add rice to a bowl, top it with the bang bang chicken and drizzle with the leftover sauce.

bbq-beef-baked-sweet-potato.name: BBQ Beef Baked Sweet Potato
steps: Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork, then microwave for 5 minutes to soften them.
Lightly spray the potatoes with low-calorie spray, season with salt and air fry for 20 minutes.
Fry the onion and pepper in a pan until softened.
Season with garlic and chilli.
Add the mince and stir-fry until almost cooked.
Add the BBQ seasoning, BBQ sauce and black beans.
Stir-fry for another 3 to 4 minutes.
Once the sweet potatoes are cooked, slice them open, top with the BBQ beef mixture, then garnish with guacamole and coriander.

beef-enchilada-skillet.name: Beef Enchilada Skillet
steps: Fry the onions until soft, then add the mince and cook until cooked through.
Add passata, smoked paprika, BBQ seasoning and garlic.
Mix in the sweetcorn along with the water.
Tear tortilla wraps into strips, then add to the pan, sprinkle with cheese and cook until the cheese has melted.
Remove from the pan and garnish with (optional) spring onions, sour cream and coriander.

beef-fried-rice.name: Beef Fried Rice
steps: Cook the jasmine rice according to the packet instructions, then spread it out to cool.
Heat a large pan or wok and fry the beef mince until browned.
Add the onion and red pepper and cook for 3 to 4 minutes until softened.
Stir in the ginger, crushed chillies and Chinese five spice, then pour in the soy sauce.
Add the peas and sweetcorn, then toss in the cooled rice and stir-fry until piping hot.

big-mac-burger.name: Big Mac Burger
steps: In a small bowl, mix the mayo, ketchup, mustard and seasonings.
Add 150 g mince to a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Mix these together until fully combined, then separate into 2 equal-sized burgers.
Fry the burgers in a pan using low-calorie spray and cook for 2 minutes on each side.
Once the burgers are cooked, add 1 slice of cheese to each patty and top with some white onions and gherkins.
As the cheese melts, remove the burgers from the pan and place the burger buns on the same pan and toast for 1 minute.
Remove from the pan, then add sauce to each burger bun.
Add some lettuce.

biscoff-cheesecake-pots-vr50.name: No Bake Biscoff Cheesecake Pots
biscoff-cheesecake-pots-vr50.notes: Top with extra crushed biscuits for crunch.
steps: In a bowl mix crushed Biscoff biscuits with melted butter until the texture resembles wet sand.
Divide the biscuit mixture between serving glasses and press down lightly to form a base.
Whisk together cream cheese, Greek yoghurt, icing sugar and vanilla until smooth and fluffy.
Spoon the cheesecake mixture over the biscuit bases.
Drizzle the tops with melted Biscoff spread.
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

biscoff-lava-mug-cake-vr19.name: Biscoff Lava Mug Cake
biscoff-lava-mug-cake-vr19.notes: Microwave times vary, so start with 45 seconds and check.
steps: Add flour, brown sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder and salt to a large microwave-safe mug.
Stir to combine the dry ingredients.
Add milk, vegetable oil and vanilla extract.
Mix until you have a smooth batter with no lumps.
Drop a spoonful of Biscoff spread into the centre of the batter.
Microwave on high for 45 to 60 seconds until the cake is just set on top but still gooey in the middle.
Let it cool for 1 minute before eating straight from the mug.

biscoff-overnight-oats-vr02.name: Biscoff Overnight Oats
biscoff-overnight-oats-vr02.notes: Use almond milk to keep it lighter, or whole milk for extra creaminess.
steps: Add oats, milk, Greek yoghurt, chia seeds, honey and a pinch of salt to a jar.
Stir well until everything is evenly combined.
Microwave the Biscoff spread for a few seconds until runny, then swirl it through the oat mixture.
Cover the jar and chill in the fridge overnight or for at least 4 hours.
Before serving, top with crushed Biscoff biscuit and an extra drizzle of Biscoff if desired.

biscoff-tiramisu-cups-vr41.name: Biscoff Tiramisu Cups
biscoff-tiramisu-cups-vr41.notes: Do not soak the biscuits for too long or they will go mushy.
steps: In a bowl whisk mascarpone, double cream, icing sugar and vanilla until thick and fluffy.
Dip Biscoff biscuits quickly into the cooled coffee and break into pieces.
Layer soaked biscuit pieces, mascarpone cream and a drizzle of melted Biscoff spread into serving glasses.
Repeat the layers until the glasses are filled.
Chill for at least 2 hours.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

buffalo-chicken-burger.name: Buffalo Chicken Burger
steps: Butterfly the chicken breast.
Crack the eggs into a bowl with 1 tbsp of buffalo sauce.
Whisk together with a fork until fully combined.
Add the panko breadcrumbs to a separate bowl.
Dip the chicken breast into the egg mixture, then straight into the breadcrumbs, making sure it is fully coated on both sides.
Air fry at the highest temperature for 12 to 15 minutes.
Once the chicken is cooked through, add it to a bowl with the remaining buffalo sauce.
Toss it around in the sauce until fully coated.
Add some ranch sauce and lettuce to your burger bun, then place the chicken on top.

buffalo-chicken-crunchwrap.name: Buffalo Chicken Crunchwrap
steps: In a bowl, combine the chicken and buffalo sauce.
Slice a tortilla halfway down the middle.
Add the cheese to the half where you haven’t sliced.
Add the chicken, Greek yogurt, spring onions and peppers to the remaining sections.
Fold each quarter of the wrap onto the next one until the wrap is fully sealed.
Fry the wrap in a frying pan for 1 to 2 minutes on each side.

buffalo-chicken-loaded-fries.name: Buffalo Chicken Loaded Fries
steps: Cut the potatoes into chips and microwave them for 5 minutes to soften.
Once soft, season with garlic, onion and smoked paprika.
Place them in the air fryer at the highest temperature for 14 minutes.
Cut the chicken into small bite-size pieces and fry them in a pan until cooked through.
Transfer the cooked chicken to a bowl, then add the buffalo sauce and cream cheese.
Mix until everything is combined.
Once the chips are cooked, transfer them to a dish and top with the buffalo chicken mixture, cheese, spring onion and garlic mayo.

buffalo-chicken-quesadilla.name: Buffalo Chicken Quesadilla
steps: Fry the onions and peppers in a pan until soft.
Add the chicken and season with garlic, smoked paprika and water.
Stir until the chicken is cooked through.
Add the cream cheese and buffalo sauce.
Mix well until everything is fully combined.
Remove the buffalo chicken mixture from the pan.
Place a tortilla onto the same pan, then add the buffalo chicken mixture onto one half.
Sprinkle some low-fat cheese over the chicken, then fold the wrap over to make a quesadilla.
Fry the quesadilla on both sides until slightly crisp, then remove from the pan.
Open it up and add the Greek yogurt and some fresh coriander.

burrito-fold-quesadillas-vr45.name: Burrito Fold Quesadillas
burrito-fold-quesadillas-vr45.notes: Use leftover chilli instead of chicken for a different twist.
steps: Place a tortilla on a chopping board and make a single cut from the centre to the edge.
Imagine the tortilla divided into four quarters.
Add rice to one quarter, shredded chicken and salsa to the next, grated cheese to the third and lettuce with sour cream to the last.
Fold each quarter over the next, working around to make a layered triangle.
Repeat with the second tortilla.
Cook the folded quesadillas in a dry frying pan for 2 to 3 minutes on each side until golden and the cheese has melted.
Serve hot.

butter-chicken-with-rice.name: Butter Chicken With Rice
steps: Combine the chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, garam masala, chilli powder, turmeric, coconut milk, passata and butter in the slow cooker.
Cover and cook on high for 4 hours or low for 6 hours.
Fifteen minutes before serving, mix the cornflour and water until you get a smooth consistency.
Add the cornflour mix alongside the Greek yogurt into the slow cooker and mix well until fully combined.
Cover with the lid and cook on high for another 15 minutes.
Boil the rice.

cajun-chicken-alfredo.name: Cajun Chicken Alfredo
steps: Dice the sweet potatoes, then microwave for 5 minutes.
Spray with low-calorie spray and season with 1 tbsp chilli powder and 1 tsp smoked paprika.
Air fry the potatoes at the highest temperature for 15 minutes.
Whilst the potatoes are cooking, fry the onions until soft.
Add the mince and fry until brown.
Then add the peppers, taco seasoning and 1 tsp smoked paprika.
Then add passata, salt and pepper and stir until combined.
Reduce to a simmer until the potatoes are ready.
Portion it out, add a handful of spring onions, chillies and 10 g sriracha mayo.

caramelised-banana-toast-vr29.name: Caramelised Banana Crunch Toast
caramelised-banana-toast-vr29.notes: Tastes like dessert but still works as a fun breakfast.
steps: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Spread peanut butter over each slice.
Melt butter in a frying pan over medium heat.
Add sliced banana and brown sugar.
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes, gently turning, until the bananas are soft and caramelised.
Spoon the caramelised banana over the peanut butter toast.
Sprinkle with chopped nuts and a pinch of cinnamon before serving.

carbonara.name: Carbonara
steps: Fry the onions.
Then, add the mince and season with garlic, ginger, chilli and Chinese 5 spice.
Stir-fry until the beef is cooked, then remove from the pan.
In the same pan, fry off the peppers, peas and sweetcorn until soft.
Once the rice is cooked, drain it and add it to the pan along with soy sauce.
Mix well until everything is fully combined, then add the beef back into the pan.

ingredients: Broccoli, Cut Into Small Florets (1 Medium Head)
cheesy-broccoli-pasta-bake-vr28.name: Cheesy Broccoli Pasta Bake
cheesy-broccoli-pasta-bake-vr28.notes: Add cooked bacon or ham for a meatier version.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Cook the pasta in salted boiling water for 8 minutes, adding the broccoli florets for the last 3 minutes.
Drain the pasta and broccoli and set aside.
In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in milk until you have a smooth sauce.
Simmer for 3 to 4 minutes until slightly thickened.
Stir in grated cheddar, half the parmesan and mustard until melted.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Combine the pasta, broccoli and cheese sauce in a baking dish.
Top with breadcrumbs and the remaining parmesan.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until golden and bubbling.

chicken-burrito-bowl.name: Chicken Burrito Bowl
steps: In a small bowl, mix the mayo, ketchup, mustard and seasonings.
Add 150 g mince to a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Mix these together until fully combined, then separate into 2 equal-sized burgers.
Fry the burgers in a pan using low-calorie spray and cook for 2 minutes on each side.
Once the burgers are cooked, add 1 slice of cheese to each patty and top with some white onions and gherkins.
As the cheese melts, remove the burgers from the pan and place the burger buns on the same pan and toast for 1 minute.
Remove from the pan, then add sauce to each burger bun.
Add some lettuce.

chicken-caesar-wraps-vr49.name: Chicken Caesar Wraps
chicken-caesar-wraps-vr49.notes: Use a low fat Caesar dressing if you want to lighten it up.
steps: In a bowl toss shredded lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Lay the tortilla wraps on a board and add the dressed lettuce down the centre of each.
Top with sliced chicken, grated parmesan and crushed croutons.
Roll up tightly, tucking in the ends, then slice in half to serve.

chicken-curried-crispy-potatoes.name: Chicken Curried Crispy Potatoes
steps: Dice the potatoes and microwave for 5 minutes to soften them, then air fry at 200°C for 15 minutes.
Fry the onions, then add the chicken with garlic and chilli.
Once the chicken is cooked, add in the peppers and stir-fry for 3 to 4 minutes.
Add the water and curry sauce and mix well until combined.
Once the curry starts to thicken, reduce the pan to a simmer until the potatoes are cooked.
Add the potatoes and mix well.

chicken-satay-noodles.name: Chicken Satay Noodles
steps: Combine the chicken, coconut milk, garlic, curry powder, soy sauce and peanut butter in the slow cooker.
Give it a good stir, then add in the peppers.
Cover and cook on low for 8 hours, or high for 4 hours.
Fifteen minutes before serving, add the vegetable stock and dry noodles into the slow cooker.
Cover with a lid and cook on low for another 15 minutes.

chicken-tikka-masala.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Mix the chicken pieces, some onion and garlic granules, tikka masala paste and yogurt until combined.
Fry the chicken off in a pan on medium heat.
Once it is semi-cooked, add 50 ml water to prevent the chicken from sticking to the pan.
Once cooked through, remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add the onions and peppers and fry until softened.
Add 50 ml water to prevent the vegetables from sticking to the pan.
Add in the chopped tomatoes, ginger, garlic and tikka masala paste and stir until fully combined.
Reduce to a simmer and stir in the yogurt.
Then, add the chicken back into the pan and stir until fully combined.
Remove the curry from the heat, then stir in the cream cheese.

chicken-tzatziki-flatbread.name: Chicken Tzatziki Flatbread
steps: Prepare the tzatziki sauce by combining the yogurt, cucumber (chopped), dill, garlic, lemon juice and olive oil.
Mix well until combined, then season with salt.
Microwave the flatbread for 10 to 15 seconds to warm it.
Spread half of the tzatziki sauce over the base.
Top with the lettuce, tomato, onions and cooked chicken, then drizzle any leftover sauce over the top.
Wrap it up tight.

chilli-cheese-rice.name: Chilli Cheese Rice
steps: Fry the onions and mince in a pan with some chilli and garlic.
Once the mince is cooked, add in the peppers and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add in the passata and season with the smoked paprika, BBQ seasoning and chilli powder.
Add in 100 ml water and stir until you get a nice saucy consistency.
Reduce to a simmer, then add in the full packet of microwave rice.
Stir-fry for another 2 to 3 minutes, until the rice is cooked through.
Stir in the sweetcorn and season with some salt, pepper and lime juice.
Top it off with some cheese, then put the lid on for 30 seconds to help the cheese melt.
Remove from the pan and garnish with some spring onions and chilli.

chilli-garlic-butter-chicken.name: Chilli Garlic Butter Chicken
steps: Dice the potatoes and microwave for 5 minutes until softened.
Season with ½ tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp garlic.
Air fry at the highest temperature for 15 minutes.
In a frying pan, fry the onions with the butter, garlic and chilli paste.
Once you get a jammy texture, add the chicken and stir-fry until almost cooked.
Add the peppers, water, milk, cream cheese and parsley.
Mix well until fully combined and stir-fry for 3 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Remove the pan from the heat and mix in the crispy air-fried potatoes.

chopped-italian-salad-sub-vr09.name: Chopped Italian Salad Sub
chopped-italian-salad-sub-vr09.notes: Add sliced pepperoncini or jalapeños for extra tang.
steps: Add shredded lettuce, chopped salami, ham, cheese, cherry tomatoes and red onion to a large bowl.
In a separate small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, dried oregano, salt and black pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad mix.
Use a large knife or scissors to chop and mix everything together in the bowl until finely chopped and well coated.
Slice the sub rolls open and lightly toast if you like.
Stuff each roll generously with the chopped salad mixture and serve immediately.

cookie-dough-protein-bites-vr22.name: Cookie Dough Protein Bites
cookie-dough-protein-bites-vr22.notes: Store in the fridge for up to 5 days.
steps: Add oats, protein powder and a pinch of salt to a bowl and stir.
Add peanut butter, honey and milk.
Mix until a thick dough forms, adding a splash more milk if needed.
Stir in dark chocolate chips.
Roll the mixture into small bite-sized balls.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to firm up before eating.

corn-riblets-vr59.name: Air Fryer Corn Riblets
corn-riblets-vr59.notes: Take care when cutting the corn; use a sharp knife and work slowly.
steps: Carefully quarter each corn on the cob lengthways to create riblet shapes.
In a bowl mix olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt and black pepper.
Toss the corn riblets in the seasoned oil until well coated.
Air fry at 190°C for 12 to 15 minutes, shaking halfway, until charred and tender.
Serve hot with lime wedges for squeezing over.

cottage-cheese-ice-cream-vr34.name: Cottage Cheese Protein Ice Cream
cottage-cheese-ice-cream-vr34.notes: If freezing longer, let it sit at room temperature for 10 minutes before scooping.
steps: Add cottage cheese, honey, vanilla and frozen berries to a blender.
Blend until completely smooth and creamy.
Stir in the dark chocolate chips.
Transfer the mixture to a shallow container and freeze for 1 to 2 hours until scoopable.
Scoop into bowls and serve.

ingredients: Mushroom (Leave out if your name is Claire)
craigo-s-mac-cheese-mhmj01yg.name: Craigo's Mac & Cheese
steps: Put pan of water on and boil
Add a pinch of salt
Add butter to a pan and melt
Add 2/3 heaped tablespoons of flour
Whisk until melted butter and flour have come together
Add little bits of milk and keep whisking until it becomes a white sauce - this is your roux
Add as much cheese to the sauce as you like
Add a tablespoon of Dijon Mustard
Add some Paprika, Salt and Pepper
Whisk until cheese has melted and simmer
Preheat oven to 180C
Put Macaroni into boiling water
Cook mushroom with butter until brown
Once pasta is El Dente drain and add to baking tray
Add cooked mushrooms to baking tray with Pasta
Pour over cheese sauce
Mix all until fully incorporated
Sprinkle breadcrumbs on top
Put extra cheese on top until covered
Place in oven for 30 mins
Eat once nice and brown

creamy-peppercorn-chicken.name: Creamy Peppercorn Chicken
steps: Fry chicken in a pan until cooked through.
Add the green peppers, soy sauce, ginger and garlic.
Stir well and fry these off until soft.
Add in hoisin sauce with 100 ml water.
Stir-fry until everything is fully combined and the sauce thickens.
Add in the cooked noodles and spring onions, fry for another 2 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat and garnish with more spring onions, fresh chillies and sesame seeds.

ingredients: Light Sweet Chilli Sauce (Blue Dragon) (100 g)
creamy-sweet-chilli-chicken-pasta.name: Creamy Sweet Chilli Chicken Pasta
steps: Boil the pasta until cooked.
Fry the onion, add the chicken and stir-fry until semi-cooked.
Season with smoked paprika and garlic, then add in the bell peppers and stir-fry until the chicken is cooked through.
Add the sweet chilli, cream cheese and pasta water.
Mix well.
Add basil, salt and pepper.
Once the sauce starts to bubble, add in the cooked pasta and toss it around until fully coated in the sauce.
Divide into portions and garnish with extra basil and chilli flakes.

creamy-tomato-gnocchi-bake-vr15.name: Creamy Tomato Gnocchi Bake
creamy-tomato-gnocchi-bake-vr15.notes: If your pan is not ovenproof, transfer everything to a baking dish before topping with cheese.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Heat olive oil in an ovenproof pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in passata and stir in dried basil, dried oregano, salt and black pepper.
Simmer for 3 to 4 minutes.
Stir in the double cream.
Add the gnocchi directly to the sauce and stir until coated.
Top with grated mozzarella and parmesan.
Bake for 15 minutes until the cheese is golden and bubbling and the gnocchi is tender.
Scatter with fresh basil leaves before serving.

creamy-tuscan-salmon.name: Creamy Tuscan Salmon
steps: Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Sear in a hot pan on all sides until coloured, then remove from the heat and set aside.
In the same pan, fry the shallot and garlic.
Mix in the cherry tomatoes, sundried tomatoes, smoked paprika and basil.
Sauté for a few minutes, then add in a stock cube mixed with 200 ml water.
Bring to a simmer, tip in the butter beans and leave for 5 minutes.
Add in the crème fraîche, parmesan and spinach.
Then place the salmon fillets into the dish and allow to warm through until they are cooked.

ingredients: Crispy Chicken Fillets (4, Oven Or Air Fryer)
crispy-chicken-wraps-vr06.name: Crispy Chicken Crunch Wraps
crispy-chicken-wraps-vr06.notes: Use a non-stick pan so the wraps crisp without extra oil.
steps: Cook the crispy chicken fillets according to the packet instructions until golden and hot.
In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise and hot sauce to make a spicy mayo.
Lay a tortilla wrap on a board and spread the centre with spicy mayo.
Add shredded lettuce, sliced tomato and a crispy chicken fillet.
Top with grated cheddar and a small handful of crushed tortilla chips.
Season lightly with salt and black pepper.
Fold the edges of the wrap tightly into a hexagon shape, tucking as you go.
Place the wrap seam-side down in a dry pan and cook over medium heat for 2 to 3 minutes per side until crisp and sealed.
Repeat with the remaining wraps and serve warm.

crispy-parmesan-courgette-fries-vr26.name: Crispy Parmesan Courgette Fries
crispy-parmesan-courgette-fries-vr26.notes: These work well in an air fryer too; cook at 200°C for about 10 minutes.
steps: Preheat the oven to 210°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Cut courgettes into fry-shaped sticks.
Beat the egg in a shallow bowl.
In another bowl, mix breadcrumbs, grated parmesan, garlic powder, salt and black pepper.
Dip each courgette stick into egg, then coat in the breadcrumb mixture.
Place on the tray and spray lightly with oil.
Bake for 15 to 18 minutes, turning once, until crisp and golden.
Serve with your favourite dipping sauce.

crispy-parmesan-taco-shells-vr40.name: Crispy Parmesan Taco Shells
crispy-parmesan-taco-shells-vr40.notes: Work quickly when shaping as the cheese firms up fast.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Mix grated parmesan with dried oregano, chilli flakes and a little black pepper.
Spoon small mounds of the cheese mixture onto the tray and spread into thin circles.
Bake for 6 to 8 minutes until golden and bubbling.
Carefully lift each circle off the tray and drape over a wooden spoon handle balanced between two cups to form a taco shell shape.
Allow to cool and harden, then fill with your favourite taco fillings.

crispy-rice-salmon-bites-vr35.name: Crispy Rice Salmon Bites
crispy-rice-salmon-bites-vr35.notes: Use good quality sushi-grade salmon if serving raw.
steps: Mix the warm sushi rice with rice vinegar and soy sauce, then press it firmly into a small lined dish to about 2 cm thick.
Chill in the fridge for at least 20 minutes to firm up.
In a bowl mix diced salmon, mayonnaise, sriracha, spring onion and sesame oil.
Once the rice is firm, cut it into bite-sized rectangles.
Heat a thin layer of vegetable oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.
Fry the rice rectangles for 2 to 3 minutes on each side until crisp and golden, then drain on kitchen paper.
Top each crispy rice piece with a spoonful of salmon mix and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Serve immediately.

crispy-smashed-potatoes-vr18.name: Crispy Smashed Potatoes
crispy-smashed-potatoes-vr18.notes: Delicious dipped in garlic mayo or sour cream.
steps: Preheat the oven to 210°C.
Boil the new potatoes in salted water for 12 to 15 minutes until just tender.
Drain the potatoes and let them steam dry for a minute.
Transfer to a lined baking tray.
Use a glass or potato masher to gently smash each potato until flattened but still in one piece.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt and black pepper.
Roast for 20 to 25 minutes until very crisp and golden.
Scatter with chopped parsley and serve hot.

fajita-chicken-crunchwrap.name: Fajita Chicken Crunchwrap
steps: Slice the tortilla halfway down the middle.
Add the cheese to the first quarter.
Add the chicken to the second quarter.
Add the avocado, tomatoes and spring onion to the third quarter.
Add the salsa to the fourth quarter.
Fold each quarter onto the next one until the wrap is fully sealed.
Fry the wrap in a frying pan for 1 to 2 minutes on each side, or until crispy.

fajita-chicken-with-crispy-potato-cubes.name: Fajita Chicken With Crispy Potato Cubes
steps: Dice the potatoes, then microwave for 5 minutes until soft.
Spray the potatoes with some low-calorie spray and season with ½ tsp garlic and 1 tbsp fajita seasoning.
Air fry at 200°C for 12 to 15 minutes, or place them in the oven at the highest temperature for 20 minutes.
Whilst the potatoes are cooking, fry the chicken and onions in a pan until the chicken is almost cooked through.
Add the peppers, chopped chillies, tomato purée and water.
Mix everything together until a sauce consistency is formed and add some salt and pepper.
Reduce to a simmer for another 5 minutes, or until the potatoes are nice and crisp.
Remove the pan from the heat, then add the crispy potatoes on top.
Mix well until the potatoes are coated in the sauce.
Top with some fresh coriander and parmesan.

feta-watermelon-salad-vr25.name: Feta Watermelon Summer Salad
feta-watermelon-salad-vr25.notes: Great as a side dish for barbecues.
steps: Add watermelon cubes to a large serving bowl.
Scatter over crumbled feta and sliced red onion.
Tear mint leaves and sprinkle on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.
Season lightly with salt and black pepper and toss gently.
Serve chilled.

ingredients: Nando's Garlic Medium Peri-Peri Sauce (80 g)
garlic-bread-nandos-burger.name: Garlic Bread Nando's Burger
steps: Tenderise the chicken with a meat mallet, then transfer to a bowl.
Add the Nando's seasoning and sauce, making sure the chicken is fully coated on all sides.
Place the chicken into the air fryer at 200°C for 16 minutes.
Add the butter and garlic purée to a small dish and microwave until melted.
Once melted, stir in some mixed herbs and toast the ciabatta roll.
When there are 2 minutes left on the chicken cooking time, add the low-fat cheese on top of the chicken, then air fry for the remaining 2 minutes.
Spread the garlic butter over the toasted ciabatta, add some lettuce and top with the cheesy chicken and Perinaise.

ingredients: Chicken Breast, Cut Into Small Cubes (500 g)
garlic-parmesan-chicken-bites-vr16.name: Garlic Parmesan Chicken Bites
garlic-parmesan-chicken-bites-vr16.notes: Serve with a side salad or rice to make it a full meal.
steps: Add chicken cubes to a bowl and drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle over grated parmesan, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt and black pepper.
Toss until the chicken is evenly coated.
Air fry at 190°C for 10 to 12 minutes, shaking halfway, until golden and cooked through.
Alternatively, bake on a lined tray at 200°C for 15 to 18 minutes.
Toss with chopped parsley and extra parmesan before serving.

green-goddess-salad-vr46.name: Green Goddess Chopped Salad
green-goddess-salad-vr46.notes: Keeps well in the fridge for a day so it is great for meal prep.
steps: Add chopped cabbage, cucumber and spring onions to a large bowl.
In a blender combine basil, parsley, chives, spinach, Greek yoghurt, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt and black pepper.
Blend until smooth and vibrant green.
Pour the dressing over the chopped vegetables and toss until everything is well coated.
Serve with tortilla chips or on toast.

ingredients: Egg Tender Noodles, Straight to Wok (Tesco) (600 g)
hoisin-chicken-noodles.name: Hoisin Chicken Noodles
steps: Tenderise the chicken with a meat mallet, then transfer to a bowl.
Add the Nando's seasoning and sauce, making sure the chicken is fully coated on all sides.
Place the chicken into the air fryer at 200°C for 16 minutes.
Add the butter and garlic purée to a small dish and microwave until melted.
Once melted, stir in some mixed herbs and toast the ciabatta roll.
When there are 2 minutes left on the chicken cooking time, add the low-fat cheese on top of the chicken, then air fry for the remaining 2 minutes.
Spread the garlic butter over the toasted ciabatta, add some lettuce.

honey-bbq-chicken-sweet-potato.name: Honey BBQ Chicken & Sweet Potato
steps: Microwave the sweet potato for 5 minutes, then season with 1 tsp smoked paprika, garlic and all-purpose seasoning.
Air fry at 200°C for 12 to 15 minutes.
Fry the peppers and onions until soft.
Add the chicken mince, soy sauce, garlic, smoked paprika, BBQ sauce and honey.
Stir-fry until the meat is cooked through and the sauce thickens.
Divide the sweet potatoes and chicken mixture into 4 portions and serve with rocket.
Optional: garnish with spring onions and a pinch of sesame seeds.

ingredients: Chicken Thighs, Cut Into Strips (600 g)
honey-chipotle-chicken-tacos-vr12.name: Honey Chipotle Chicken Tacos
honey-chipotle-chicken-tacos-vr12.notes: Use chicken breast if you prefer leaner meat, but thighs stay juicier.
steps: In a bowl, mix olive oil, honey, chipotle paste, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt and black pepper.
Add the chicken strips and toss until well coated, then leave to marinate for at least 10 minutes.
Heat a large frying pan over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring often, until cooked through and caramelised.
Warm the tortillas in a dry pan or the microwave.
Fill each tortilla with shredded lettuce and chipotle chicken.
Top with sliced red onion, grated cheese and a spoon of sour cream.
Serve immediately with lime wedges for squeezing.

hot-honey-chicken-rice.name: Hot Honey Chicken & Rice
steps: Add all ingredients except the rice to the slow cooker.
Cook on high for 3 to 4 hours or low for 6 hours until the chicken is tender.
Shred the chicken into the sauce.
Heat the microwave rice according to packet instructions and serve with the hot honey chicken.

ingredients: Lightest Philadelphia 3% Fat Soft Cheese (120 g)
jalapeno-popper-chicken-pasta.name: Jalapeño Popper Chicken Pasta
steps: Boil the pasta until cooked.
Fry the onions, garlic and half of the jalapeños.
Once the onion has softened, add the chicken and stir-fry for 4 minutes until the chicken is almost cooked through.
Add the milk and cream cheese and mix well until everything is fully combined.
Add in half of the low-fat cheese.
Once the sauce starts to bubble, drain the pasta and mix it into the sauce.
Add the parsley and season with some salt, then top the pan with the remaining cheese and jalapeños.
Cover with a lid until the cheese melts.

korean-style-sticky-beef-bowl-vr17.name: Korean Style Sticky Beef Bowl
korean-style-sticky-beef-bowl-vr17.notes: Use reduced-salt soy sauce if you prefer a less salty dish.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.
Add beef mince and cook, breaking it up, until browned.
Stir in minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add soy sauce, brown sugar and gochujang.
Simmer for 3 to 4 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the beef.
Warm the cooked rice and divide between bowls.
Top each bowl with sticky beef, carrot, cucumber and spring onions.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.

lemon-garlic-prawn-pasta-vr27.name: Lemon Garlic Prawn Pasta
lemon-garlic-prawn-pasta-vr27.notes: Do not overcook the prawns or they will turn rubbery.
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to packet instructions until al dente, then reserve some pasta water and drain.
Heat butter and olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the prawns and season with salt and black pepper.
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes until the prawns are pink and cooked through.
Add lemon zest, lemon juice and a splash of pasta water.
Toss the cooked spaghetti through the sauce.
Stir in chopped parsley and adjust seasoning if needed.
Serve immediately.

mexican-beef-burrito.name: Mexican Beef Burrito
steps: Fry the onion, then add the beef mince and cook until browned.
Add the red pepper and cook for a few minutes until softened.
Stir in the tomato purée and taco seasoning and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the cooked Mexican rice and sweetcorn and mix well.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Warm the wraps, then fill each with the beef and rice mixture and some grated cheese.
Roll up the burritos and drizzle with chilli mayo before serving.

moroccan-chicken-with-rice.name: Moroccan Chicken With Rice
steps: Boil the rice.
Fry the onions and carrots until soft.
Add the chicken and minced garlic.
Stir-fry until the chicken is cooked.
Add the peppers, tinned tomatoes, chickpeas and seasoning.
Mix well and cook for 5 to 10 minutes.
Mix in the green beans until they are heated through.

mozzarella-pesto-toasties-vr23.name: Mozzarella Pesto Toasties
mozzarella-pesto-toasties-vr23.notes: Add a little chilli flakes inside for a spicy kick.
steps: Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Lay three slices butter-side down and spread the unbuttered sides with pesto.
Top with sliced mozzarella and tomato.
Season lightly with salt and black pepper if you like.
Place the remaining bread slices on top, butter-side up.
Toast in a pan or sandwich press for 3 to 4 minutes per side until the bread is golden and the cheese has melted.
Slice and serve hot.

nacho-beef-crunch-wrap.name: Nacho Beef Crunch Wrap
steps: Fry the onions; once softened, add in the mince and fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Once the mince is almost cooked, add the peppers, tomato purée, taco seasoning and water.
Mix well until everything is fully coated in the seasoning and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Take one of the wraps and cut into quarters.
Take the remaining tortillas and divide the mince mixture evenly between them.
Top the mince with some low-fat cheese, jalapeños, salsa and crushed tortilla chips.
Place one of the quarter tortillas on top, then fold the wrap over it, enclosing the filling.
Place the filled wrap back in the pan with the folded side facing downwards.
Fry for 2 minutes on a high heat until the wrap is crispy and sealed shut.
Flip it over and fry on the other side for another 2 minutes until crispy.

one-pan-feta-chicken-orzo-vr48.name: One Pan Feta Chicken Orzo
one-pan-feta-chicken-orzo-vr48.notes: Add a squeeze of lemon juice at the end to brighten the flavours.
steps: Heat olive oil in a large deep pan over medium heat.
Add diced chicken and cook until browned all over.
Stir in minced garlic, cherry tomatoes and dried oregano and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in the orzo and chicken stock, season with salt and black pepper and bring to a simmer.
Cook for 10 to 12 minutes, stirring often, until the orzo is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed.
Stir in spinach until just wilted.
Sprinkle over crumbled feta and serve.

one-pot-garlic-butter-orzo-vr13.name: One Pot Garlic Butter Orzo
one-pot-garlic-butter-orzo-vr13.notes: Top with grilled chicken or roasted vegetables to turn it into a full meal.
steps: Heat butter and olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Pour in the orzo and toast for 1 to 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add the stock and bring to a gentle simmer.
Cook for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring often, until the orzo is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed.
Lower the heat and stir in grated parmesan and cream.
Add the spinach and cook for 1 to 2 minutes until just wilted.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste and serve immediately.

ingredients: Vanilla Ice Cream, Softened Slightly (500 ml)
oreo-ice-cream-sandwich-vr24.name: Oreo Ice Cream Sandwich Stack
oreo-ice-cream-sandwich-vr24.notes: Let it sit for 5 minutes before slicing so it is easier to cut.
steps: Line a small loaf tin with cling film or baking paper.
In a bowl, mix softened vanilla ice cream with milk until spreadable.
Place a layer of Oreo biscuits on the base of the tin.
Spread half of the ice cream over the biscuits.
Add another layer of Oreos and top with the remaining ice cream.
Finish with a final layer of Oreos on top, pressing gently.
Cover and freeze for at least 4 hours until firm.
Turn out onto a board, drizzle with melted dark chocolate and sprinkles, then slice into sandwiches.

oreo-protein-mug-cake-vr57.name: Oreo Protein Mug Cake
oreo-protein-mug-cake-vr57.notes: Do not overcook or it will turn rubbery.
steps: Add protein powder, flour, cocoa powder and baking powder to a large mug and mix.
Stir in milk and Greek yoghurt until a smooth batter forms.
Fold in most of the crushed Oreos.
Microwave on high for 45 to 60 seconds until risen and just set.
Top with the remaining crushed Oreo and eat warm.

pesto-eggs-breakfast-wrap-vr03.name: Pesto Eggs Breakfast Wrap
pesto-eggs-breakfast-wrap-vr03.notes: Use red pesto for a sweeter twist.
steps: Spread the pesto in a thin layer over the base of a non-stick frying pan.
Place the pan over medium heat until the pesto starts to sizzle.
Crack the eggs directly onto the pesto and season with salt and black pepper.
Cook until the whites are set but yolks are still soft, or to your liking.
Place the tortilla over the eggs in the pan and press gently so it sticks.
Carefully flip everything so the tortilla is now on the bottom.
Sprinkle mozzarella, sliced tomatoes and spinach on top and let the cheese melt.
Fold the tortilla over into a wrap shape and cook for 1 to 2 minutes more, then serve hot.

poke-inspired-salmon-rice-bowl-vr36.name: Poke Inspired Salmon Rice Bowl
poke-inspired-salmon-rice-bowl-vr36.notes: Swap salmon for tofu to make it vegetarian.
steps: In a bowl whisk together soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar and honey.
Add the diced salmon and marinate for 10 minutes in the fridge.
Warm the cooked rice and divide between two bowls.
Top each bowl with marinated salmon, cucumber, carrot, edamame and avocado.
Drizzle over any leftover marinade and sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.

ricotta-toast-vr38.name: Whipped Ricotta Honey Toast
ricotta-toast-vr38.notes: Drizzle with a little extra honey if you like it sweeter.
steps: Toast the sourdough slices until golden.
In a small bowl whisk together ricotta, honey and lemon zest until light and creamy.
Spread the whipped ricotta over the toast.
Top with fresh berries and sprinkle with crushed pistachios.
Serve immediately.

sheet-pan-breakfast-hash-vr05.name: Sheet Pan Breakfast Hash
sheet-pan-breakfast-hash-vr05.notes: Add chopped chorizo or bacon before roasting for extra flavour.
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C.
Add diced potatoes, peppers and sliced red onion to a large baking tray.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt and black pepper.
Toss everything together until the vegetables are well coated.
Roast for 20 to 25 minutes, turning once, until the potatoes are almost tender.
Make four little wells in the vegetables and crack an egg into each space.
Return the tray to the oven for 6 to 8 minutes until the eggs are cooked to your liking.
Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve straight from the tray.

slow-cooker-hiney-chilli-chicken.name: Slow Cooker Honey Chilli Chicken
steps: Add the chicken, Chinese 5 spice, passata, soy sauce, sriracha, honey and garlic into the slow cooker.
Cook on high for 3 hours or low for 6 hours.
Thirty minutes before serving, add the peppers and onions and cook for the remaining time.
Boil the rice and serve with the honey chilli chicken.

slow-cooker-pulled-bbq-beef-tacos.name: Slow Cooker Pulled BBQ Beef Tacos
steps: Add all of the ingredients except the wraps into the slow cooker.
Cook on high for 4 hours or low for 6 hours.
Once the cooking time is up, shred the beef apart using 2 forks.
Serve each portion with 3 wraps, coriander, lime and 10 g feta.

smash-burger-sliders-vr51.name: Smash Burger Sliders
smash-burger-sliders-vr51.notes: Cover the pan briefly after adding cheese to help it melt.
steps: Mix beef mince with salt and black pepper and divide into 12 equal balls.
Heat a large frying pan or griddle over high heat.
Place a beef ball onto the hot surface and smash it flat with a spatula, cooking for 2 to 3 minutes per side until browned and cooked through.
Repeat with remaining beef.
Mix mayonnaise, ketchup and mustard in a small bowl to make a burger sauce.
Toast the slider buns lightly, then spread with burger sauce.
Fill each bun with a smash patty, cheese slice, diced onion and sliced gherkins.
Serve immediately.

smash-burger-tacos-vr14.name: Smash Burger Tacos
smash-burger-tacos-vr14.notes: Cook the mince thoroughly until no pink remains.
steps: In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard and gherkin juice to make a burger sauce.
Divide the beef mince into 8 equal balls.
Place a tortilla on a board and press a beef ball directly onto the centre of the tortilla to form a thin patty.
Repeat with the remaining tortillas and beef.
Heat a large dry frying pan over medium-high heat.
Place a tortilla beef-side down in the pan and cook for 2 to 3 minutes until the meat is browned.
Flip so the tortilla is now on the bottom, sprinkle with grated cheddar and cook for another minute.
Repeat with the remaining smash tacos.
Serve topped with burger sauce, shredded lettuce, sliced gherkins and red onion.

smashed-cucumber-noodle-bowl-vr10.name: Smashed Cucumber Noodle Bowl
smashed-cucumber-noodle-bowl-vr10.notes: Tastes even better after chilling for 20 minutes in the fridge.
steps: Cook rice noodles according to the packet instructions, then drain and rinse under cold water.
Place the cucumber on a board and lightly smash it with a rolling pin or the side of a knife.
Slice the smashed cucumber into bite-sized pieces and sprinkle with a pinch of salt.
In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, honey, chilli flakes and minced garlic.
Add cooked noodles, cucumber, carrot and spring onions to a large bowl.
Pour over the dressing and toss everything until well combined.
Serve in bowls and finish with sesame seeds.

spicy-noodles-with-crispy-eg-vr30.name: Spicy Noodles With Crispy Egg
spicy-noodles-with-crispy-eg-vr30.notes: Add some frozen peas or spinach to the noodles for extra veg.
steps: Cook instant noodles according to the packet instructions, leaving out the flavour sachet.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sriracha, sesame oil and honey.
Drain the noodles and toss them in the spicy sauce.
Heat vegetable oil in a small pan over medium-high heat.
Crack in the egg and fry until the edges are crispy and the yolk is cooked to your liking.
Tip the dressed noodles into a bowl.
Top with the crispy fried egg, sliced spring onion and sesame seeds.
Serve immediately.

ingredients: Cooked Rice (250 g, Microwave Pouch Is Fine)
spicy-salmon-rice-bowl-vr07.name: Spicy Salmon Rice Bowl
spicy-salmon-rice-bowl-vr07.notes: Use brown rice for more fibre and a nuttier flavour.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Place the salmon fillets into a small baking dish.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sriracha, honey and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce over the salmon and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until just cooked through.
Warm the cooked rice and divide between two bowls.
Flake the cooked salmon over the rice, spooning over some of the sauce.
Top each bowl with sliced avocado, grated carrot and spring onion.
In a small bowl, stir together mayonnaise and extra sriracha, then drizzle over the bowls.
Finish with sesame seeds and more sriracha if you like it extra spicy.

strawberry-yoghurt-bark-vr21.name: Strawberry Yoghurt Freezer Bark
strawberry-yoghurt-bark-vr21.notes: Eat straight from the freezer for the best texture.
steps: Line a baking tray with baking paper.
In a bowl, mix Greek yoghurt, honey and vanilla extract.
Spread the yoghurt mixture evenly over the lined tray to about 1 cm thick.
Scatter chopped strawberries, granola and dark chocolate chips over the top.
Freeze for at least 3 hours until solid.
Break into shards and store in a freezer-safe container until ready to eat.

ingredients: Nori sheets, cut into small rectangles (4)
sushi-bake-vr55.name: Salmon Sushi Bake
sushi-bake-vr55.notes: Use tinned salmon if you do not have fresh.
steps: Preheat the oven to 190°C.
Mix warm sushi rice with rice vinegar, sugar and salt, then press into an even layer in a small baking dish.
In a bowl mix flaked salmon, mayonnaise, sriracha and soy sauce.
Spread the salmon mixture evenly over the rice.
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes until warmed through and slightly golden on top.
Top with sliced spring onions and sesame seeds.
Scoop portions onto nori rectangles and eat like little sushi tacos.

ingredients: Reduced-Sugar Sweet Chilli Sauce (Blue Dragon) (20 g)
sweet-chilli-beef-rice.name: Sweet Chilli Beef & Rice
steps: Add mince to a medium-heat pan with some low-calorie spray.
Chop the onion and add.
Cook the microwave rice according to the packet instructions.
Once the mince is browned, add the sweet chilli sauce and mix to combine.
Serve the beef over the rice.

sweet-chilli-chicken-wrap.name: Sweet Chilli Chicken Wrap
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Add the mixture to your wrap, then wrap it tight.
Air fry at 200°C for 6 to 7 minutes.
Slice down the middle and serve.

sweet-sour-chicken-noodles.name: Sweet & Sour Chicken Noodles
steps: Cook the noodles according to the packet instructions, then drain and set aside.
Heat a large pan or wok and stir-fry the chicken until lightly browned.
Add the red onion and bell peppers and cook for 3 to 4 minutes until starting to soften.
Stir in the chilli flakes, garlic and ginger, then add the pineapple.
Mix the ketchup, honey, soy sauce, white wine vinegar and vegetable stock, then pour into the pan.
Simmer for 6 to 8 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce thickens slightly.
Toss the cooked noodles through the sauce and serve.

taco-beef-loaded-fries.name: Taco Beef Loaded Fries
steps: Cut the potatoes into chips and microwave for 5 minutes.
Season with all-purpose seasoning and air fry at 200°C for 12 to 15 minutes.
Fry the beef with taco seasoning and tomato purée.
Once the beef is cooked through, sprinkle the cheese on top and cover with the lid to help it melt.
Serve the chips on a plate and top with cheesy taco beef.
Garnish with pickled red onion, Greek yogurt and coriander.

taco-beef-with-crispy-sweet-potato-cubes.name: Taco Beef With Crispy Sweet Potato Cubes
steps: Dice the sweet potatoes, then microwave for 5 minutes.
Spray with low-calorie spray and season with 1 tbsp chilli powder and 1 tsp smoked paprika.
Air fry the potatoes at the highest temperature for 15 minutes.
Whilst the potatoes are cooking, fry the onions until soft.
Add the mince and fry until brown.
Add the peppers, fajita seasoning and 1 tsp smoked paprika.
Add passata, salt and pepper and stir until combined.
Reduce to a simmer until the potatoes are ready.
Portion it out, add a handful of spring onions, chillies and 10 g sriracha mayo.

thai-red-curry-noodles.name: Thai Red Curry Noodles
steps: Combine the chicken, coconut milk, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, red curry paste and peppers in the slow cooker.
Cover and cook on high for 3 to 4 hours or low for 6 to 8 hours.
Fifteen minutes before serving, mix the cornflour and water until you get a smooth consistency.
Add this to the slow cooker alongside the lime juice and mix well.
Place noodle nests into the slow cooker, making sure they are fully submerged in the curry.
Cook on high for 10 minutes.

tiktok-birria-tacos-inspired-vr53.name: Easy Birria Inspired Beef Tacos
tiktok-birria-tacos-inspired-vr53.notes: Skim excess fat from the top of the cooking liquid before using as a dip.
steps: Add beef, onion, garlic, beef stock, chipotle paste, tomato puree, cumin and dried oregano to a large pot.
Bring to the boil, then reduce to a gentle simmer, cover and cook for 1.5 to 2 hours until the beef is very tender.
Remove the beef pieces from the liquid and shred with two forks.
Dip the tortillas briefly into the cooking liquid, then place into a hot frying pan.
Add shredded beef and grated cheese to one half of each tortilla, then fold over.
Cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side until crisp and the cheese is melted.
Serve with small bowls of the cooking liquid for dipping and sprinkle with fresh coriander.

tiktok-cucumber-feta-bites-vr56.name: Cucumber Feta Bites
tiktok-cucumber-feta-bites-vr56.notes: Sprinkle with chilli flakes if you like a little heat.
steps: In a small bowl mash feta with Greek yoghurt, lemon juice, honey, chopped dill and black pepper.
Use a teaspoon or melon baller to scoop a small indent out of each cucumber slice.
Fill each indent with the feta mixture.
Serve immediately as a light snack or starter.

tiktok-grinder-salad-sandwich-vr39.name: TikTok Grinder Salad Sandwich
tiktok-grinder-salad-sandwich-vr39.notes: Toast the subs first for a warm melty version.
steps: In a large bowl add shredded lettuce and sliced red onion.
In a separate bowl whisk together mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, garlic powder, chilli flakes, salt and black pepper.
Pour the dressing over the lettuce and onion and toss well.
Slice the sub rolls and layer with salami, ham and cheese.
Pile the grinder salad mixture generously into each roll.
Close the subs, press gently and serve.

tiktok-pasta-chips-vr43.name: TikTok Pasta Chips
tiktok-pasta-chips-vr43.notes: Make sure the pasta is well drained so it crisps properly.
steps: Cook the pasta until just al dente, then drain well.
Toss the warm pasta with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, grated parmesan, salt and black pepper.
Air fry at 190°C for 10 to 12 minutes, shaking halfway, until crisp and golden.
Serve with your favourite dip such as marinara or garlic yoghurt.

tiktok-ramen-vr31.name: TikTok Garlic Butter Ramen
tiktok-ramen-vr31.notes: Add leftover chicken or prawns for extra protein.
steps: Cook the ramen according to packet instructions, then drain and set aside.
Melt butter in a frying pan over medium heat and add the minced garlic.
Cook for 1 minute until fragrant, then stir in soy sauce and brown sugar.
Add the drained noodles to the pan and toss to coat in the sauce.
Push the noodles to one side and crack in the egg, scrambling gently until just cooked.
Toss everything together, then serve topped with sliced spring onion, sesame seeds and chilli flakes.

tiktok-tomato-feta-Eggs-toast-vr52.name: Tomato Feta Eggs on Toast
tiktok-tomato-feta-Eggs-toast-vr52.notes: Finish with a drizzle of chilli oil if you like heat.
steps: Heat olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat and add cherry tomatoes and minced garlic.
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes until the tomatoes soften.
Push the tomatoes to the side and crack in the eggs.
Cook until the whites are set but yolks are still soft.
Sprinkle crumbled feta over the top and season with salt and black pepper.
Toast the sourdough slices and spoon the tomato and egg mixture over the toast to serve.

tortilla-pizza-wrap-vr08.name: Tortilla Pizza Fold Wrap
tortilla-pizza-wrap-vr08.notes: Swap pepperoni for sliced mushrooms or peppers for a veggie version.
steps: Lay a tortilla wrap on a chopping board.
Cut a single straight line from the centre of the wrap to the edge.
Spread pizza sauce over the entire wrap.
Sprinkle mozzarella over the whole surface.
Place pepperoni in one quarter, sweetcorn in another and leave two quarters just cheesy.
Fold each quarter over onto the next, working around to create a layered triangle.
Repeat with the second wrap.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and lightly spray with olive oil.
Cook the folded wraps for 2 to 3 minutes on each side until golden and the cheese has melted.
Sprinkle with dried oregano before serving.

vodka-pasta-vr58.name: Creamy Vodka Tomato Pasta
vodka-pasta-vr58.notes: You can omit the vodka if you prefer and still get a great sauce.
steps: Cook the pasta according to packet instructions until al dente, then reserve a cup of pasta water and drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat and add minced garlic.
Cook for 1 minute, then stir in tomato puree and cook for another 2 minutes.
Pour in vodka and let it bubble for 2 minutes to cook off the alcohol.
Stir in double cream and chilli flakes and simmer gently.
Add the cooked pasta to the sauce, along with a splash of pasta water to loosen if needed.
Stir in grated parmesan and season with salt and black pepper.
Serve immediately.

whipped-feta-breakfast-toast-vr01.name: Whipped Feta Breakfast Toast
whipped-feta-breakfast-toast-vr01.notes: Great with a poached egg on top if you want extra protein.
steps: Toast the sourdough slices until golden and crisp.
Add feta, Greek yoghurt, olive oil and honey to a bowl.
Whisk or blend the feta mixture until smooth and creamy.
Spread a generous layer of whipped feta over each slice of toast.
Top with sliced avocado and cherry tomatoes.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Finish with fresh basil leaves and an extra drizzle of olive oil if you like.

yoghurt-breakfast-bowl-vr04.name: Crunchy Yoghurt Breakfast Bowl
yoghurt-breakfast-bowl-vr04.notes: Swap honey for maple syrup to keep it vegan if you use plant yoghurt.
steps: Spoon the Greek yoghurt into two bowls.
Drizzle honey over the yoghurt.
Top each bowl with granola, sliced banana and mixed berries.
Warm the peanut butter slightly so it is runny and drizzle over the bowls.
Finish with a sprinkle of chia seeds and serve immediately.

yoghurt-marinated-chicken-skewers-vr54.name: Yoghurt Marinated Chicken Skewers
yoghurt-marinated-chicken-skewers-vr54.notes: Soak wooden skewers in water for 20 minutes before using so they do not burn.
steps: In a bowl mix Greek yoghurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, paprika, cumin, olive oil, salt and black pepper.
Add chicken cubes and toss to coat, then cover and marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes.
Thread the marinated chicken onto skewers.
Grill or air fry at 190°C for 12 to 15 minutes, turning once, until cooked through and slightly charred.
Serve with flatbreads and salad.

yoghurt-toast-vr33.name: Custard Yoghurt Toast
yoghurt-toast-vr33.notes: Dust with icing sugar just before serving if you like.
steps: Preheat the oven or air fryer to 180°C.
In a small bowl mix Greek yoghurt, egg, honey and vanilla until smooth.
Use the back of a spoon to press down the centre of each bread slice, leaving a raised border.
Spoon the yoghurt mixture into the indent on each slice.
Top with sliced strawberries and blueberries.
Bake or air fry for 8 to 10 minutes until the edges are crisp and the custard is set.
Serve warm.

ingredients: Nori strips and sesame seeds for serving
tiktok-salmon-rice-bowl-vr101.name: TikTok Salmon Rice Bowl
tiktok-salmon-rice-bowl-vr101.notes: Use leftover rice for the best texture.
steps: Season salmon with soy sauce and bake at 200°C for 12 to 14 minutes.
Flake the salmon with a fork and stir in mayo and sriracha.
Divide warm rice into bowls and top with salmon mixture.
Add avocado, cucumber, nori, and sesame seeds.
Serve immediately while warm.

green-goddess-salad-vr102.name: Green Goddess Salad
green-goddess-salad-vr102.notes: Serve with tortilla chips for scooping.
steps: Add cabbage, cucumber, and green onions to a large bowl.
Blend spinach, basil, chives, lemon juice, olive oil, and feta until smooth.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well.
Chill for 10 minutes before serving.

hot-honey-chicken-bites-vr103.name: Hot Honey Chicken Bites
hot-honey-chicken-bites-vr103.notes: Swap in an air fryer if you like extra crisp edges.
steps: Marinate chicken in buttermilk, salt, and pepper for 10 minutes.
Coat chicken in panko mixed with paprika.
Bake at 220°C for 15 minutes until crisp.
Warm hot honey with butter and toss chicken to coat.
Serve with extra drizzle.

butter-board-with-garlic-herbs-vr104.name: Butter Board with Garlic Herbs
butter-board-with-garlic-herbs-vr104.notes: Let the butter sit at room temperature for easier spreading.
steps: Spread softened butter over a serving board.
Sprinkle with garlic, herbs, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle with olive oil if desired.
Serve with warm bread.

grinder-sandwich-salad-vr105.name: Grinder Sandwich Salad
steps: Combine romaine, tomatoes, pepperoncini, and deli meats in a bowl.
Whisk mayonnaise and vinegar to make the dressing.
Toss salad with dressing and add provolone.
Serve chilled.

chopped-italian-sandwich-bowl-vr106.name: Chopped Italian Sandwich Bowl
chopped-italian-sandwich-bowl-vr106.notes: Swap in turkey or pepperoni as needed.
steps: Add lettuce, meats, mozzarella, tomatoes, and olives to a bowl.
Drizzle with Italian dressing and toss.
Season with black pepper.
Serve immediately.

baked-oats-with-blueberry-lemon-vr107.name: Baked Oats with Blueberry Lemon
baked-oats-with-blueberry-lemon-vr107.notes: Top with extra berries for serving.
steps: Blend oats, banana, egg, milk, lemon zest, and honey until smooth.
Fold in blueberries.
Pour into a greased ramekin.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.
Serve warm.

cottage-cheese-ice-cream-vr108.name: Cottage Cheese Ice Cream
cottage-cheese-ice-cream-vr108.notes: Let it sit for 5 minutes before scooping.
steps: Blend cottage cheese, syrup, vanilla, and salt until creamy.
Fold in frozen strawberries.
Transfer to a loaf pan and freeze for 2 hours.
Scoop and serve.

sushi-bake-cups-vr109.name: Sushi Bake Cups
steps: Mix rice with vinegar and press into a muffin tin.
Stir salmon with mayo and sriracha.
Spoon salmon mixture into rice cups.
Bake at 200°C for 12 minutes.
Top with nori and cucumber before serving.

tortilla-wrap-hack-trio-vr110.name: Tortilla Wrap Hack Trio
tortilla-wrap-hack-trio-vr110.notes: Swap fillings with tuna or veggies.
steps: Cut a slit from the center to the edge of each tortilla.
Place chicken, cheese, avocado, and salsa in quadrants.
Fold into a triangle wrap.
Toast in a pan for 2 minutes per side.
Serve with Greek yoghurt.

pesto-eggs-on-toast-vr111.name: Pesto Eggs on Toast
steps: Spread pesto in a hot nonstick pan.
Crack eggs into the pesto and fry until set.
Toast the bread.
Serve eggs over toast with avocado.

onion-boil-foil-packets-vr112.name: Onion Boil Foil Packets
onion-boil-foil-packets-vr112.notes: Serve alongside grilled meats or fish.
steps: Peel onions and cut a deep cross on top.
Stuff each onion with butter, garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Wrap tightly in foil.
Bake at 200°C for 35 minutes until tender.
Garnish with parsley.

cloud-bread-sandwich-vr113.name: Cloud Bread Sandwich
steps: Whip egg whites with cream of tartar until foamy.
Add sugar and whip to stiff peaks.
Fold in cornstarch and salt.
Pipe into rounds and bake at 150°C for 25 minutes.
Cool before using as sandwich bread.

whipped-coffee-dalgona-vr114.name: Whipped Coffee Dalgona
whipped-coffee-dalgona-vr114.notes: Use oat milk for a dairy-free version.
steps: Whisk coffee, sugar, and hot water until thick and fluffy.
Fill a glass with ice and milk.
Spoon whipped coffee on top.
Stir before drinking.

pancake-cereal-vr115.name: Pancake Cereal
pancake-cereal-vr115.notes: Use a squeeze bottle for easy piping.
steps: Mix pancake batter until smooth.
Pipe small dots onto a greased skillet.
Flip when bubbles form and cook through.
Serve in a bowl with syrup and berries.

quesabirria-tacos-vr116.name: Quesabirria Tacos
steps: Heat shredded beef in a skillet with consommé.
Dip tortillas in consommé and place on a hot griddle.
Fill with beef, cheese, onion, and cilantro.
Fold and cook until crispy.
Serve with extra consommé for dipping.

nashville-hot-mozzarella-sticks-vr117.name: Nashville Hot Mozzarella Sticks
nashville-hot-mozzarella-sticks-vr117.notes: Serve with ranch or blue cheese.
steps: Dip mozzarella sticks in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs.
Freeze for 10 minutes.
Fry or bake until golden.
Toss with melted butter, hot sauce, and cayenne.

spicy-rigatoni-vodka-vr118.name: Spicy Rigatoni Vodka
spicy-rigatoni-vodka-vr118.notes: Reserve pasta water to loosen the sauce.
steps: Cook rigatoni until al dente.
Sauté garlic and pepper flakes in oil.
Stir in tomato paste and cook until deep red.
Add vodka and cream, then toss with pasta.
Serve with grated parmesan.

gochujang-butter-noodles-vr119.name: Gochujang Butter Noodles
gochujang-butter-noodles-vr119.notes: Add a fried egg for extra richness.
steps: Cook noodles and reserve 1/4 cup of pasta water.
Melt butter and whisk in gochujang, soy sauce, and honey.
Toss noodles with sauce and a splash of pasta water.
Top with green onions and sesame seeds.

chili-crisp-garlic-butter-eggs-vr120.name: Chili Crisp Garlic Butter Eggs
chili-crisp-garlic-butter-eggs-vr120.notes: Use chili crisp oil for extra crunch.
steps: Melt butter in a pan and add garlic.
Crack in eggs and spoon chili crisp over the whites.
Cook until whites are set.
Serve over toast.

tiktok-lemon-pasta-vr121.name: TikTok Lemon Pasta
steps: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Melt butter with lemon zest and juice in a pan.
Add pasta water and parmesan, stirring until creamy.
Toss spaghetti in the sauce.
Finish with black pepper.

smashed-burger-tacos-vr122.name: Smashed Burger Tacos
smashed-burger-tacos-vr122.notes: Use a cast-iron pan for best sear.
steps: Press beef onto tortillas and season.
Cook beef-side down in a hot skillet until browned.
Flip to toast the tortilla.
Top with lettuce, onion, and burger sauce.

sheet-pan-gnocchi-caprese-vr123.name: Sheet Pan Gnocchi Caprese
sheet-pan-gnocchi-caprese-vr123.notes: Serve with balsamic glaze if desired.
steps: Toss gnocchi and tomatoes with olive oil.
Roast at 220°C for 20 minutes.
Stir in pesto and mozzarella.
Bake 5 more minutes until melted.
Top with basil.

smash-dumpling-tacos-vr124.name: Smash Dumpling Tacos
smash-dumpling-tacos-vr124.notes: Use chicken or tofu instead of pork.
steps: Mix pork with soy sauce and ginger.
Press a thin layer of filling onto each wrapper.
Cook filling-side down until crisp.
Flip to warm the wrapper.
Top with cabbage and chili oil.

spicy-tuna-crispy-rice-vr125.name: Spicy Tuna Crispy Rice
steps: Season rice with vinegar and press into a pan.
Chill for 10 minutes then cut into squares.
Pan-fry rice squares until crisp.
Mix tuna with mayo, sriracha, and soy sauce.
Top crispy rice with tuna and avocado.

viral-cucumber-salad-vr126.name: Viral Cucumber Salad
steps: Add cucumbers to a lidded container.
Shake with soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, and sugar.
Sprinkle with chili flakes and sesame seeds.
Serve chilled.

marry-me-chicken-vr127.name: Marry Me Chicken
marry-me-chicken-vr127.notes: Finish with parmesan for extra richness.
steps: Sear chicken in olive oil until golden.
Add garlic and sun-dried tomatoes.
Pour in cream and stock, then season.
Simmer for 15 minutes until chicken is cooked.
Serve with pasta or rice.

honey-butter-toast-vr128.name: Honey Butter Toast
steps: Toast the bread until golden.
Mix butter with honey, cinnamon, and salt.
Spread honey butter over warm toast.
Serve immediately.

ramen-lasagna-vr129.name: Ramen Lasagna
ramen-lasagna-vr129.notes: Add spinach between layers for extra greens.
steps: Cook ramen until just tender and drain.
Brown beef with garlic powder and stir in marinara.
Layer ramen, ricotta, sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Rest for 5 minutes before slicing.

cinnamon-roll-pancakes-vr130.name: Cinnamon Roll Pancakes
cinnamon-roll-pancakes-vr130.notes: Use a squeeze bottle for the swirl.
steps: Mix melted butter, brown sugar, and cinnamon.
Cook pancakes and swirl cinnamon mixture on top.
Flip and cook until set.
Whisk icing sugar with milk for glaze.
Drizzle glaze over pancakes.

baked-parmesan-potatoes-vr131.name: Baked Parmesan Potatoes
baked-parmesan-potatoes-vr131.notes: Serve with a squeeze of lemon.
steps: Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet lined with parmesan.
Bake at 220°C for 25 minutes until crisp.
Garnish with parsley.

crispy-potato-stack-muffins-vr132.name: Crispy Potato Stack Muffins
crispy-potato-stack-muffins-vr132.notes: Use a mandoline for even slices.
steps: Toss potato slices with butter and seasonings.
Stack slices in a greased muffin tin.
Bake at 200°C for 30 minutes.
Top with parmesan and bake 5 more minutes.

tater-tot-waffles-vr133.name: Tater Tot Waffles
tater-tot-waffles-vr133.notes: Top with chives for extra flavor.
steps: Heat a waffle iron and grease it lightly.
Spread tater tots in the waffle iron and season.
Cook for 12 minutes until crisp.
Serve with sour cream.

dill-pickle-ranch-salad-vr134.name: Dill Pickle Ranch Salad
steps: Whisk pickle juice into ranch dressing.
Combine romaine, pickles, chicken, and cheddar.
Toss with dressing.
Serve chilled.

spicy-korean-fried-chicken-bowls-vr135.name: Spicy Korean Fried Chicken Bowls
spicy-korean-fried-chicken-bowls-vr135.notes: Use air fryer for a lighter option.
steps: Coat chicken with cornstarch and fry until crisp.
Simmer gochujang, honey, and soy sauce.
Toss chicken in sauce.
Serve over rice with cucumber.

grinder-sliders-vr136.name: Grinder Sliders
grinder-sliders-vr136.notes: Brush buns with garlic butter before baking.
steps: Layer salami, turkey, and mozzarella on buns.
Bake at 190°C for 10 minutes.
Toss lettuce with mayo and vinegar.
Stuff sliders with dressed lettuce and serve.

feta-fried-eggs-vr137.name: Feta Fried Eggs
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet and add feta.
Crack eggs over feta and fry until set.
Season with pepper.
Serve with toast.

sriracha-chicken-lettuce-wraps-vr138.name: Sriracha Chicken Lettuce Wraps
sriracha-chicken-lettuce-wraps-vr138.notes: Top with chopped peanuts for crunch.
steps: Cook ground chicken in a skillet until browned.
Stir in sriracha, soy sauce, and honey.
Add carrots and bell pepper and cook 2 minutes.
Spoon into lettuce leaves and serve.

mango-sticky-rice-bowls-vr139.name: Mango Sticky Rice Bowls
steps: Cook sticky rice until tender.
Warm coconut milk with sugar and salt.
Stir coconut milk into rice.
Serve with mango slices and sesame seeds.

korean-corn-dogs-vr140.name: Korean Corn Dogs
korean-corn-dogs-vr140.notes: Swap half the hot dog with mozzarella for cheese pull.
steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and milk into a thick batter.
Skewer hot dogs and coat with batter.
Roll in panko crumbs.
Fry until golden and drain.
Dust with sugar if desired.

egg-flight-trio-vr141.name: Egg Flight Trio
egg-flight-trio-vr141.notes: Use a muffin tin for baked eggs instead.
steps: Fry or scramble eggs in three small pans.
Top one portion with pesto, one with salsa, one with chili crisp.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with toast.

chickpea-cookie-dough-bites-vr142.name: Chickpea Cookie Dough Bites
chickpea-cookie-dough-bites-vr142.notes: Store in the fridge for up to 4 days.
steps: Blend chickpeas, peanut butter, syrup, vanilla, and salt until smooth.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Chill for 20 minutes.
Roll into bite-sized balls.

oreo-mug-cake-vr143.name: Oreo Mug Cake
steps: Crush cookies and mix with milk and baking powder.
Pour into a mug.
Microwave for 90 seconds.
Top with whipped cream.

cheesecake-stuffed-strawberries-vr144.name: Cheesecake Stuffed Strawberries
steps: Hull strawberries and hollow slightly.
Whisk cream cheese with icing sugar and vanilla.
Pipe filling into strawberries.
Sprinkle with crushed graham crackers.

lemon-posset-pots-vr145.name: Lemon Posset Pots
steps: Simmer cream and sugar for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice.
Pour into small cups.
Chill for 2 hours and top with zest.

pink-sauce-pasta-vr146.name: Pink Sauce Pasta
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil.
Stir in marinara and cream.
Toss pasta with sauce and parmesan.
Serve hot.

cereal-milk-french-toast-vr147.name: Cereal Milk French Toast
cereal-milk-french-toast-vr147.notes: Use fruity cereal for extra flavor.
steps: Whisk cereal milk, eggs, and vanilla.
Dip brioche slices in mixture.
Cook in butter until golden.
Serve with maple syrup.

ranch-pickle-chips-vr148.name: Ranch Pickle Chips
steps: Dip pickle chips in buttermilk.
Coat with flour, breadcrumbs, and ranch seasoning.
Fry until golden.
Drain and serve.

street-corn-dip-vr149.name: Street Corn Dip
steps: Char corn in a skillet until slightly browned.
Mix mayo, sour cream, cotija, chili powder, and lime juice.
Stir in corn and cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

smoked-salmon-bagel-board-vr150.name: Smoked Salmon Bagel Board
steps: Arrange toasted bagels on a board.
Add smoked salmon, cream cheese, and vegetables.
Scatter capers and dill.
Let everyone build their own bagel.

upside-down-puff-pastry-tarts-vr151.name: Upside Down Puff Pastry Tarts
steps: Sprinkle sugar on a baking sheet.
Arrange apple slices and dot with butter.
Top with puff pastry squares.
Bake at 200°C for 18 minutes.
Flip and serve.

crunchwrap-supreme-copycat-vr152.name: Crunchwrap Supreme Copycat
steps: Layer beef and nacho cheese on tortillas.
Add tostada shell, lettuce, tomato, and sour cream.
Fold tortilla edges and toast in a skillet.
Flip until crisp on both sides.
Serve hot.

sushi-sandwich-onigirazu-vr153.name: Sushi Sandwich Onigirazu
sushi-sandwich-onigirazu-vr153.notes: Use smoked salmon or tofu instead.
steps: Place nori on a sheet of plastic wrap.
Spread rice in the center.
Layer shrimp, avocado, and cucumber.
Top with more rice and fold into a parcel.
Slice in half and serve with soy sauce.

avocado-feta-smash-toast-vr154.name: Avocado Feta Smash Toast
avocado-feta-smash-toast-vr154.notes: Add sliced tomatoes for extra freshness.
steps: Toast bread until golden.
Mash avocado with feta, lemon juice, and salt.
Spread on toast.
Top with chili flakes.

deli-pasta-salad-vr155.name: Deli Pasta Salad
deli-pasta-salad-vr155.notes: Add olives or pepperoncini for tang.
steps: Cook pasta and rinse under cold water.
Combine pasta with meats, cheese, and tomatoes.
Toss with Italian dressing.
Chill before serving.

garlic-confit-focaccia-vr156.name: Garlic Confit Focaccia
garlic-confit-focaccia-vr156.notes: Serve warm with extra garlic oil.
steps: Simmer garlic in olive oil on low heat for 15 minutes.
Press dough into a pan and dimple.
Pour garlic oil over dough and scatter cloves.
Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes.
Top with rosemary and flaky salt.

pull-apart-pepperoni-bread-vr157.name: Pull Apart Pepperoni Bread
steps: Slice bread in a crosshatch pattern.
Stuff with mozzarella and pepperoni.
Brush with butter mixed with garlic powder.
Bake at 190°C for 15 minutes.
Top with parmesan and serve.

chili-cheese-dog-bake-vr158.name: Chili Cheese Dog Bake
steps: Place buns in a baking dish and add hot dogs.
Spoon chili over the top.
Sprinkle with cheddar.
Bake at 190°C for 15 minutes.
Top with onions.

loaded-potato-soup-bread-bowls-vr159.name: Loaded Potato Soup Bread Bowls
loaded-potato-soup-bread-bowls-vr159.notes: Toast the bread bowls for extra crunch.
steps: Warm potato soup until hot.
Hollow out bread bowls.
Fill with soup and top with cheddar, bacon, and sour cream.
Garnish with chives.

crispy-rice-paper-dumplings-vr160.name: Crispy Rice Paper Dumplings
steps: Cook ground chicken with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Soak rice paper sheets and place filling inside.
Fold into dumplings.
Pan-fry until crisp and golden.

spicy-tomato-beans-on-toast-vr161.name: Spicy Tomato Beans on Toast
steps: Sauté garlic in olive oil.
Add tomatoes, beans, and chili flakes.
Simmer for 8 minutes.
Serve over toasted sourdough.

balsamic-strawberry-jam-toast-vr162.name: Balsamic Strawberry Jam Toast
balsamic-strawberry-jam-toast-vr162.notes: Add basil for a fresh twist.
steps: Simmer strawberries with balsamic and sugar until jammy.
Toast bread and spread with ricotta.
Top with warm strawberry jam.
Serve immediately.

scallion-pancakes-vr163.name: Scallion Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, water, and salt into a dough.
Roll out, brush with sesame oil, and scatter scallions.
Roll up and flatten into a pancake.
Pan-fry until golden on both sides.

sweet-potato-glass-noodles-vr164.name: Sweet Potato Glass Noodles
steps: Cook noodles according to package directions.
Sauté mushrooms and carrots until tender.
Toss noodles with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Combine with vegetables and green onions.

peanut-butter-ramen-vr165.name: Peanut Butter Ramen
peanut-butter-ramen-vr165.notes: Top with green onions or peanuts.
steps: Cook ramen and reserve some cooking water.
Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, vinegar, and chili flakes.
Stir in warm cooking water to thin the sauce.
Toss noodles with sauce and serve.

chocolate-chip-skillet-cookie-vr166.name: Chocolate Chip Skillet Cookie
steps: Cream butter and sugars.
Mix in egg, flour, and baking soda.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Press into a skillet and bake at 180°C for 18 minutes.
Serve warm.

banana-bread-brownies-vr167.name: Banana Bread Brownies
banana-bread-brownies-vr167.notes: Swirl in peanut butter if desired.
steps: Mash bananas and whisk with butter and sugar.
Add eggs, flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Pour into a lined pan.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

brown-butter-rice-krispie-treats-vr168.name: Brown Butter Rice Krispie Treats
brown-butter-rice-krispie-treats-vr168.notes: Grease the spatula for easy mixing.
steps: Brown butter in a pot.
Add marshmallows and stir until melted.
Mix in vanilla and salt.
Fold in cereal and press into a pan.
Cool before cutting.

s-mores-dip-vr169.name: S'mores Dip
steps: Spread butter in a small skillet.
Add chocolate chips and top with marshmallows.
Bake at 200°C for 5 minutes.
Serve with graham crackers.

hot-chocolate-bombs-vr170.name: Hot Chocolate Bombs
hot-chocolate-bombs-vr170.notes: Drop into hot milk to serve.
steps: Melt chocolate and coat silicone molds.
Chill until set.
Fill halves with cocoa mix and marshmallows.
Seal with melted chocolate and decorate.

pesto-tortellini-salad-vr171.name: Pesto Tortellini Salad
pesto-tortellini-salad-vr171.notes: Add arugula for a peppery bite.
steps: Cook tortellini and rinse under cold water.
Toss with pesto.
Add tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
Chill before serving.

cowboy-caviar-vr172.name: Cowboy Caviar
cowboy-caviar-vr172.notes: Let it chill for 10 minutes to meld.
steps: Combine beans, corn, tomatoes, and onion.
Whisk lime juice with olive oil.
Toss with vegetables and cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

chili-crunch-oil-noodles-vr173.name: Chili Crunch Oil Noodles
chili-crunch-oil-noodles-vr173.notes: Add a soft-boiled egg for protein.
steps: Cook noodles according to package directions.
Whisk chili crisp, soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar.
Toss noodles with sauce.
Top with green onions.

caprese-sandwich-skewers-vr174.name: Caprese Sandwich Skewers
caprese-sandwich-skewers-vr174.notes: Add prosciutto for a savory twist.
steps: Thread tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil onto skewers.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve chilled.

philly-cheesesteak-sloppy-joes-vr175.name: Philly Cheesesteak Sloppy Joes
steps: Brown beef with onions and peppers.
Add stock and Worcestershire, simmer until thick.
Spoon onto rolls and top with provolone.
Melt cheese under the grill.

cheeseburger-egg-rolls-vr176.name: Cheeseburger Egg Rolls
cheeseburger-egg-rolls-vr176.notes: Serve with burger sauce for dipping.
steps: Cook ground beef and stir in ketchup.
Place beef, cheddar, and pickles on wrappers.
Roll tightly and seal edges.
Fry until golden.

buffalo-chicken-dip-stuffed-peppers-vr17.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip Stuffed Peppers
