steps: Mix chicken with cream cheese and hot sauce.
Fill pepper halves with mixture.
Top with cheddar.
Bake at 190°C for 20 minutes.
Garnish with green onions.

french-onion-soup-pasta-vr178.name: French Onion Soup Pasta
french-onion-soup-pasta-vr178.notes: Use mozzarella if gruyere isn't available.
steps: Caramelize onions in butter until deep golden.
Cook pasta until al dente.
Add stock and thyme to onions and simmer.
Toss pasta with onion sauce.
Top with gruyere and broil until melted.

creamy-tuscan-gnocchi-vr179.name: Creamy Tuscan Gnocchi
steps: Sauté garlic in olive oil.
Add gnocchi and cook until lightly browned.
Stir in sun-dried tomatoes and cream.
Add spinach and simmer until wilted.
Top with parmesan.

garlic-parmesan-pasta-chips-vr180.name: Garlic Parmesan Pasta Chips
steps: Toss cooked pasta with oil and seasonings.
Spread on a baking sheet.
Bake at 200°C for 15 minutes until crisp.
Serve with marinara dip.

mini-pancake-cereal-bowls-vr181.name: Mini Pancake Cereal Bowls
mini-pancake-cereal-bowls-vr181.notes: Use Greek yoghurt for extra protein.
steps: Cook mini pancakes on a griddle.
Place into bowls and top with yoghurt.
Add berries and drizzle with syrup.
Serve immediately.

pickle-de-gallo-vr182.name: Pickle de Gallo
steps: Combine pickles, tomatoes, and onion.
Stir in pickle juice and lime juice.
Fold in cilantro.
Serve with chips.

elote-ramen-vr183.name: Elote Ramen
elote-ramen-vr183.notes: Add hot sauce for extra kick.
steps: Cook ramen and drain.
Warm corn in a skillet.
Stir mayo, lime juice, and chili powder into ramen.
Top with corn, cotija, and cilantro.

birria-ramen-vr184.name: Birria Ramen
birria-ramen-vr184.notes: Use leftover birria for quick prep.
steps: Heat birria consommé in a pot.
Cook ramen noodles in consommé.
Add shredded beef and warm through.
Serve topped with onion, cilantro, and lime.

butter-chicken-naan-pizzas-vr185.name: Butter Chicken Naan Pizzas
steps: Spread butter chicken sauce over naan.
Top with chicken and mozzarella.
Bake at 200°C for 12 minutes.
Finish with cilantro.

hot-honey-halloumi-bowls-vr186.name: Hot Honey Halloumi Bowls
hot-honey-halloumi-bowls-vr186.notes: Swap quinoa for rice if preferred.
steps: Sear halloumi until golden.
Drizzle with hot honey.
Divide quinoa into bowls and add roasted vegetables.
Top with halloumi and avocado.
Serve with lemon wedges.

caesar-smashed-potatoes-vr187.name: Caesar Smashed Potatoes
steps: Boil potatoes until tender.
Smash on a baking sheet and drizzle with oil.
Bake at 220°C for 20 minutes.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and sprinkle parmesan.

garlic-parmesan-chicken-skewers-vr188.name: Garlic Parmesan Chicken Skewers
garlic-parmesan-chicken-skewers-vr188.notes: Brush with melted butter before serving.
steps: Toss chicken with olive oil, garlic, parmesan, and seasoning.
Thread onto skewers.
Grill or bake at 200°C for 15 minutes.
Serve with extra parmesan.

spicy-peach-glazed-salmon-vr189.name: Spicy Peach Glazed Salmon
spicy-peach-glazed-salmon-vr189.notes: Serve with rice and steamed greens.
steps: Whisk peach preserves, sriracha, soy sauce, and lime juice.
Brush salmon with glaze and season with salt.
Bake at 200°C for 15 minutes.
Brush with extra glaze before serving.

blueberry-lemon-yogurt-bark-vr190.name: Blueberry Lemon Yogurt Bark
steps: Mix yoghurt with honey and lemon zest.
Spread on a lined tray.
Top with blueberries and almonds.
Freeze for 2 hours and break into pieces.

frozen-grapes-with-tajin-vr191.name: Frozen Grapes with Tajin
steps: Toss grapes with lime juice and Tajin.
Freeze for 1 hour.
Serve straight from the freezer.

cloud-eggs-vr192.name: Cloud Eggs
steps: Separate eggs and whip whites with salt to stiff peaks.
Spoon whites onto a baking sheet and make a well.
Bake at 180°C for 6 minutes.
Add yolks to wells and bake 3 minutes more.
Top with parmesan and chives.

feta-tomato-orzo-bake-vr193.name: Feta Tomato Orzo Bake
feta-tomato-orzo-bake-vr193.notes: Add spinach at the end for extra greens.
steps: Add tomatoes, feta, oil, and garlic to a baking dish.
Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Stir in orzo and 2 cups hot water.
Bake 12 minutes until orzo is tender.
Top with basil.

smashed-brussels-sprouts-vr194.name: Smashed Brussels Sprouts
steps: Boil Brussels sprouts until tender.
Smash on a baking sheet and drizzle with oil.
Season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Bake at 220°C for 15 minutes.
Sprinkle with parmesan.

parmesan-crusted-chicken-caesar-wrap-vr1.name: Parmesan Crusted Chicken Caesar Wrap
parmesan-crusted-chicken-caesar-wrap-vr1.notes: Toast the wrap for extra crunch.
steps: Coat chicken in parmesan and panko.
Bake at 200°C for 18 minutes and slice.
Toss romaine with Caesar dressing.
Fill tortillas with chicken and salad, then roll.

crunchy-ramen-slaw-vr196.name: Crunchy Ramen Slaw
steps: Toast crushed ramen, almonds, and sesame seeds in a skillet.
Whisk vinegar, soy sauce, and honey.
Toss cabbage with dressing.
Top with crunchy noodle mix.

cinnamon-roll-french-toast-bake-vr197.name: Cinnamon Roll French Toast Bake
steps: Cut cinnamon rolls into quarters and place in a baking dish.
Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Pour over rolls and let soak 5 minutes.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Drizzle with icing.

pesto-egg-breakfast-burrito-vr198.name: Pesto Egg Breakfast Burrito
steps: Scramble eggs with pesto.
Warm tortillas and add eggs and cheese.
Top with avocado.
Roll into burritos and serve.

garlic-bread-grilled-cheese-vr199.name: Garlic Bread Grilled Cheese
steps: Mix butter with garlic powder and spread on bread.
Layer mozzarella and parmesan between slices.
Grill in a pan until golden and melty.
Slice and serve.

mexican-street-corn-rice-bowl-vr200.name: Mexican Street Corn Rice Bowl
steps: Char corn in a skillet until browned.
Stir mayo, lime juice, and chili powder into corn.
Divide rice into bowls and top with corn mixture.
Sprinkle with cotija and cilantro.
